description: Sent if a sensor fails
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorInfoSensorFailed FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorTypeId i 1 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorGroupId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorName s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorHwModuleId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorStateOper i 1

description: Unique ID of the sensor within it's sensor type.
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorId

description: Sensor type.
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorTypeId

description: If several sensors belong to the same sensor group,
they share the same sensorGroupId value (e.g.: redundant power supplies)
0 if the sensor is not member of a group (standalone sensor)
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorGroupId

description: Name of the sensor
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorName

description: Reference to FREQUENTIS-HARDWAREINFO-MODULES-MIB, hwModuleId
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorHwModuleId

description: Operative status.
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorStateOper

description: Sent if a senso threshold is exceeded

event.Summary: Sensor $v1 of type $v2 exceeded the threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorInfoThresholdExceeded FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorTypeId i 1 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorGroupId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorName s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorHwModuleId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SENSORINFO-MIB::sensorValueCurrent i 9999
